d:
Note from the Author: This comic has some fetiches like omorashi, urination, small dicks and furries!
You read the comic the same way you read a manga, from back to front!

Synopsis: After a long day out drinking canned juice, Kegarashi-kun returns home desperate to pee. However, he discovers he left his key inside and his mother will be late. Will our hero be able to hold it in, or will he not be able to?

Good Reading :D
